name: 林顯易
objective: 工業機器人概論，基礎理論分析：運動學，動力學，控制等，機器人之設計程序，機器人在彈性裝配與製造系統之應用分析與系統設計，智慧型機器人，個案研究等 。
schedule:
Week1: Class introduction
Week2: Fundamental of robotics
Week3: Kinematics (I)
Week4: Kinematics (II)
Week5: Kinematics (III)
Week6: Differential motions (I)
Week7: Differential motions (II)
Week8: Dynamics (I)
Week9: Dynamics (II)
Week10: Dynamics (III)
Week11: Mid-term exam
Week12: Trajectory planning (I)
Wee13:  Trajectory planning (II)
Week14: Motion control (I)
Week15: Motion control (II)
Week16: Actuators and drive systems
Week17: Sensors
Week18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
1 mid-term examination                     30% 
1 mid-term project                             20%
1 final project                                    20%
1 final examination                            30%
materials:
Textbook:  
Saeed B. Niku, Introduction to Robotics: Analysis, Systems, Applications, Prentice-Hall, NJ, Second Edition, 2010.
Mark W. Spong, Seth Hutchinson, and M. Vidyasagar, Robot Modeling and Control, John Wiley & Sons, NJ, 2006.
Reference text: 
King Sun Fu, C. S. George Lee, Ralph Gonzalez, Robotics: Control, Sensing, Vision and Intelligence, McGraw-Hill.
Richard P. Paul, Robot Manipulators: Mathematics, Programming, and Control, The MIT Press.
